txt.en: The refugees from Langhold find themselves hungry in their makeshift camp outside of Harwick.

'Thank you for returning with the food you found while in Langhold! What little food we brought with us was sure to run out soon.\n\n'Harding has been gracious enough to offer us his protection, but it is clear he cannot burden the people of his city with so many hungry mouths. This will help to sustain us while we get back on our feet.'
The refugees from Langhold find themselves hungry in their makeshift camp outside of Harwick.
The ruins of Langhold may yet hold some food left behind by the refugees ere they fled.\n\nYou should search the homes of Langhold for unspoiled food that may have been left behind.
Bring the unspoiled food to Cíllan
Cíllan is waiting in the Refugee Camp outside Harwick.\n\nYou should bring the food you gathered to Cíllan.
